Articles.Content:
Since last weeks upgrade And after 500hrs play KSP just wont fly. 1st,  in my saves it spins out of control (yes i select (T) ) when Jeb EVA's out (space transfer) this ship spins out of control, jeb with all qualifications cant hold a coarse. Now after a delete from steam and re-install the basic 1, fuel tank, 3 fins, just a successful launch is impossible spine out of control at lift off.

Question!! If i re- buy this game from Squad for my PC,  WILL it work like it used to I am happy with Vanilla + docking computer,

is Modual Manager the problem. help plz, iam really gutted i cant play this Great Game.

Regards Brian
Guys sorry for the panic help  Iv sorted it.. It was a joystick config setup error
